r.d: The Log framework provides an abstracted logging system. It supports logging to console, file, syslog, SQL, Sqlite, mail and mcal targets. It also provides a subject - observer mechanism.
r.n: The SQL handler failed to prepare the SQL statement when an existing database connection was provided. (Bug 5702) The SQL handler now supports user-provided SQL insertion statements via the 'sql' configuration parameter. (Request 5703)
